name: oc-p9-billed
description: Administrative website for Human Resource employees.

scripts.install-all: npm i && npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.start-dev: npm run install-all && concurrently "npm run server-dev" "npm run client" & npm run test-client
scripts.start: npm run install-all && concurrently "npm run server-dev" "npm run client"

author: miervaldis42
